name: RetailReady
headline: An AI-powered supply chain compliance engine
description: Every time workers in a warehouse box an order, they reference a 100 page manual with instructions like where to put the shipping label. RetailReady replaces the instruction manual with a tablet application.

founders.name: Elle Smyth, Founder
founders.description: Elle is the Co-Founder of RetailReady, which she started with Sarah Hamer. An engineering graduate from Duke University, she worked at BlackRock and Stord prior to becoming an entrepreneur. She is driven by immense curiosity and a love for solving complex problems in the supply chain industry.

founders.name: Sarah Hamer, Founder
founders.description: Sarah graduated as an industrial engineer from Georgia Tech, was very involved in GT's entrepreneurship community and started her career at Microsoft. After a few years she missed the crazy, fast-paced startup life, and made the switch to Stord – a unicorn supply chain software startup. It was there that she saw retail compliance pain points first hand, met her co-founder, and decided to start RetailReady.

# RetailReady is the future of supply chain compliance
Meet the system enabling brands and 3PLs to achieve zero chargebacks while helping retailers process inbound shipments faster.
[Meet with us](https://www.retailreadyai.com/<https:/cal.com/retail-ready>)
![3PL Tasks](https://www.retailreadyai.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fhero1.60122559.png&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_G6pijnSmqydLyWcwawdnhKqdNpmx)
## Compliant shipping made easy
Check out the retail flows we've built to ensure compliant and efficient shipping
![CVS](https://www.retailreadyai.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fcvs.71d9f6f0.png&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_G6pijnSmqydLyWcwawdnhKqdNpmx)
![Chewy](https://www.retailreadyai.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fchewy.aca9bf74.png&w=1080&q=75&dpl=dpl_G6pijnSmqydLyWcwawdnhKqdNpmx)
![Dick's Sporting Goods](https://www.retailreadyai.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fdicks.1d290123.png&w=1920&q=75&dpl=dpl_G6pijnSmqydLyWcwawdnhKqdNpmx)
![Dillards](https://www.retailreadyai.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fdillards.51200786.png&w=640&q=75&dpl=dpl_G6pijnSmqydLyWcwawdnhKqdNpmx)
![H-E-B](https://www.retailreadyai.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fheb.f63bec4c.png&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_G6pijnSmqydLyWcwawdnhKqdNpmx)
![JCPenney](https://www.retailreadyai.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fjcpenney.3f6a4165.png&w=1920&q=75&dpl=dpl_G6pijnSmqydLyWcwawdnhKqdNpmx)
## The Challenge of Retail Compliance
Retailers have complex shipping requirements that lead to costly chargebacks. Here's how RetailReady solves this.
### Lightning Fast Setup
Deploy across your warehouse network in days, not months. Immediate impact on operations.
### Real-time Updates
Stay ahead with instant notifications about compliance changes and requirements.
### Mobile First
Intuitive mobile interface designed for warehouse operations and on-the-go management.
### Automated Workflows
Streamline operations with AI-powered task management and compliance checks.
## Join the future of retail compliance
Many warehouses have already transformed their operations with RetailReady. Experience how our platform can revolutionize your supply chain compliance.
[Schedule a Demo](https://www.retailreadyai.com/<https:/cal.com/retail-ready>)
![RetailReady Logo](https://www.retailreadyai.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fretailready.2fd335ae.png&w=256&q=75&dpl=dpl_G6pijnSmqydLyWcwawdnhKqdNpmx)[Privacy](https://www.retailreadyai.com/</privacy-policy>)[Terms](https://www.retailreadyai.com/</terms-of-service>)

generated_description:
**RetailReady: The Future of Supply Chain Compliance**

Imagine a warehouse worker struggling with a hefty 100-page manual just to box an order. That was the reality. But RetailReady, founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator Batch W24, shows us a smarter way. By leveraging AI, they’ve crafted an innovative supply chain compliance engine that replaces cumbersome instruction manuals with a sleek tablet application. 

**Mission Statement**  
RetailReady's mission is straightforward: deliver an AI-powered solution that simplifies and ensures supply chain compliance. They aim to eliminate costly chargebacks for retailers while accelerating the processing of inbound shipments.

**Location and Team**  
Operating from an undisclosed location, RetailReady is made up of a lean team of five talented individuals. They are guided by Jared Friedman, a Group Partner at Y Combinator, whose experience adds weight to RetailReady's entrepreneurial journey.

**What They Do**  
RetailReady is all about making compliant shipping a breeze. Here’s how they tackle the challenges of retail compliance:

- **Lightning Fast Setup**: Roll out their system across warehouses in days, not months.
- **Real-time Updates**: Get instant notifications about compliance changes.
- **Mobile First**: An intuitive mobile interface designed for warehouse operations leads to seamless management on-the-go.
- **Automated Workflows**: Smart task management and compliance checks powered by AI streamline operations.

**Why It Matters**  
Retailers often face complex shipping requirements that lead to expensive chargebacks. RetailReady simplifies this process through their innovative platform, transforming how warehouses operate. They offer case studies showcasing their partnerships with major brands like CVS, Chewy, and JCPenney, underscoring their efficacy in the real world.

**Join the Movement**  
If you're in the retail or logistics sector and are tired of drowning in compliance chaos, RetailReady is the solution you've been waiting for. Their approach promises not only to enhance operational efficiency but also to revolutionize supply chain compliance.

In the rapidly changing landscape of retail, staying compliant doesn’t have to be a struggle. Join RetailReady as they pave the way for a smarter, more efficient future in supply chain management. 

For more information, check out their [website](https://www.retailreadyai.com/).
